application.controller

Class STIGViewerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.STIGViewerController

  • public class STIGViewerController
extends Object
    application.controller.STIGViewerController is the controller for the STIGViewer view. It provides functionality for filtering STIGRules, displaying severity distribution of filtered STIGRules, and viewing information of a STIGRule.
    Author:
    Jacob Rahimi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void AddFilter()
      Adds a STIGFilter generated from the contents of FilterField, MatachButton, and FilterTextField to the FilterTable, and updates the displayed filteredSTIGRules.
      (package private) void DeleteFilter()
      Deletes the selected STIGFilter rule from the FilterTable, and updates the displayed filteredSTIGRules
      (package private) void displaySelectedRule(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Displays the STIGRule selected from the STIGRuleTable
      (package private) void GoToLocalCatalog(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is a method to allow functionality of the GoToLocalCatalog button to switch the scene to the LocalCatalog
      (package private) void GoToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is a method to allow functionality of the GoToMainMenu button to switch the scene to the MainMenu
      (package private) void GoToOnlineCatalog(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This is a method to allow functionality of the GoToOnlineCatalog button to switch the scene to the OnlineCatalog
      (package private) void initializeSTIGViewer(File stigFile)
      This method initializes the STIGViewer Controller by loading the referenceSTIG, displaying the STIGRules, and adding the FilterField items.
      (package private) void updateFilteredSTIGRules()
      Generates a STIGRule ArrayList with only STIGRules that match the filters, and uses this STIGRule ArrayList to update the STIG Rule Table and Rule Severity Chart.

      • GoToMainMenu

        void GoToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
           throws IOException
        This is a method to allow functionality of the GoToMainMenu button to switch the scene to the MainMenu
        Parameters:
        event - - the event from clicking on the button which is used to reference the scene to switch the view
        Throws:
        IOException - - errors when there was an issue loading the fxml file

      • initializeSTIGViewer

        void initializeSTIGViewer(File stigFile)
                   throws ParserConfigurationException,
                          SAXException,
                          IOException
        This method initializes the STIGViewer Controller by loading the referenceSTIG, displaying the STIGRules, and adding the FilterField items.
        Parameters:
        stigFile - - the file to be read to initialize the referenceSTIG
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - - errors when there was issue in parsing the file
        SAXException - - errors when there was an issue reading/parsing the file
        IOException - - errors when there was an issue reading form the file

      • updateFilteredSTIGRules

        void updateFilteredSTIGRules()
        Generates a STIGRule ArrayList with only STIGRules that match the filters, and uses this STIGRule ArrayList to update the STIG Rule Table and Rule Severity Chart.
